courses.title: Introduction to Painting
courses.subtitle: Explore the basics of painting techniques
courses.description: Learn color theory, brushwork, and composition in this foundational painting course designed for beginners.

courses.title: Digital Illustration Masterclass
courses.subtitle: Master the tools and techniques of digital art
courses.description: Dive into digital illustration using tools like Procreate and Photoshop, guided by industry professionals.

courses.title: Sculpture Techniques
courses.subtitle: Working with clay, metal, and wood
courses.description: A hands-on course teaching sculpting fundamentals, suitable for both hobbyists and aspiring professionals.

courses.title: Modern Art and Critique
courses.subtitle: Understanding the evolution and impact of modern art
courses.description: Analyze key movements in modern art and develop critical skills to interpret artistic works.

courses.title: Basics of Physics
courses.subtitle: Understand the laws of motion and energy
courses.description: Get introduced to classical mechanics and basic concepts of physics through interactive modules.

courses.title: Organic Chemistry
courses.subtitle: Dive into the world of carbon compounds
courses.description: A detailed exploration of organic molecules, reactions, and mechanisms.

courses.title: Introduction to Astronomy
courses.subtitle: Explore the universe beyond Earth
courses.description: Discover planets, stars, and galaxies using modern telescopic data.

courses.title: Principles of Accounting
courses.subtitle: Master the language of business
courses.description: Understand the basic concepts of accounting, journal entries, ledgers, and financial statements.

courses.title: Microeconomics Explained
courses.subtitle: Learn how individual markets work
courses.description: From demand-supply to elasticity and market structures, this course covers it all.

courses.title: Business Law Basics
courses.subtitle: Legal aspects every entrepreneur should know
courses.description: Learn about contracts, partnerships, company law, and more.
